reviewText: The film -  in a foreign language - was difficult to reset into English so I could watch it ONCE. since then, it WILL NOT PLAY AT ALL.
It's the one I wanted but it was a waste of money. Because when I went to play it I couldn't it said "can't be played in this region. What's up with that?
Love the movie. .don't buy this WHY the dvd is from Germany not American made I didn't know when i got it yesterday would play on my blu-ray play  :(
Loved it in 1981, love it now.
